name: Raposim
description:
A tamagochi-like game about... me!

Since the theme of the jam was Cycles, I decided to make a game about doing your best with your daily routines. 

The theme is a free  song called "Tbone and friends".

The translation to English was a bit rushed, but it's there!

Also special thanks to otakumaromba.itch.io for helping me with the translation!
